name: Gunplay Apocalypse
description:
Gunplay Apocalypse is finally here ! The block has been flooded with zombies - it’s up to you to save the streets ! Blast the zombies , secure the bags and unlock secret characters while fighting off the Apocalypse !

Features
~~~~~~~~~~~~

- iOS 10 or later support
- Power Up
- Character unlocking
- Better sound effects
- 4 levels

Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at - DMPmarketingNManagement@gmail.com
